messages.title: SNP WORKING FOR SCOTLAND
messages.content: In 2007 the first SNP government in Scotland's history was elected with the support of Scots from all walks of life. We have delivered 84 of our 94 headline manifesto commitments and we look to the next four years determined to do more... Together, we can make Scotland better.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We can keep the 1,000 extra police on our streets. We can freeze the Council Tax for another two years. And we can protect NHS budgets ensuring healthcare continues to improve.
We can keep the 1,000 extra police on our streets. We can freeze the Council Tax for another two years.

issues.economy: We can freeze the Council Tax for another two years.
issues.health: And we can protect NHS budgets ensuring healthcare continues to improve.

quotes.text: Together, we can make Scotland better.
